TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlLangPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlLangPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlLangPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 識別要與 [xml:lang](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xml-lang-handling-in-xaml.md) 屬性 (Attribute) 產生關聯的屬性 (Property)。

span.span: Identifies the property to associate with the [xml:lang](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xml-lang-handling-in-xaml.md) attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
